development.//channel: Which adapter to use. ChartIq's Electron Security Adapter or Openfin. Valid values are e2o and openfin. Default: e2o.
development.//e2odebug: Whether to start e2o in debug mode. Default: true.
development.//breakpointOnStart: Whether to pause e2o when it starts. Default: false.

production.//channel: Which adapter to use. ChartIq's Electron Security Adapter or Openfin. Valid values are e2o and openfin. Default: e2o.
production.//e2odebug: Whether to start e2o in debug mode. Default: true.
production.//breakpointOnStart: Whether to pause e2o when it starts. Default: false.
